sub_title: Small Business Owner at BRITISH ENGLISH To Go
summary:
Freelance Education Consultant with extensive tutoring, lecturing and curriculum development experience:

•	Curriculum Development
•	English for Academic Purposes (EAP) and Study Skills tutoring 
•	Lecturing – marketing 
•	Online tutoring – business studies
•	Teaching English as a Foreign Language

An enthusiastic practitioner, seeking opportunities to share academic and business expertise in a range teaching settings. 

Twenty years in business to a senior level prior to fulfilling current roles in academia during the past ten years, so offering students a valuable blend of relevant experience. 

Special interest in cultivating effective application of English language and study skills for academic and working environments.
